name: RailLoop
description:
This is a prototype for the Ludum Dare 47 on the theme "Stuck in a loop".

Implemented features:

  • Extend the rail network with the “tracks” tool
  • Add a train station with the “train station” tool

Planned features:

  • The train automatically stops at each station
  • A resource system
  • Special stations to collect resources
  • A slider to control the train's speed
  • Infinite generated maps
  • Environmental objects like trees, rocks, mountains, ...
